definitions.definition: A trainee , especially in a skilled trade .

One who is bound by indentures or by legal agreement to serve a tradesperson , or other person, for a certain time, with a view to learn the art, or trade , in which his master is bound to instruct him.
One not well versed in a subject; a tyro or newbie .

main_definition: A trainee , especially in a skilled trade .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) One who is bound by indentures or by legal agreement to serve a tradesperson , or other person, for a certain time, with a view to learn the art, or trade , in which his master is bound to instruct him.
( dated ) One not well versed in a subject; a tyro or newbie .
